Name: Furious Revenge of Bolo
About the game: In the game Furious Revenge of the Bolo, you will learn a touching and fascinating story with the personal experiences of the main character. The game takes place in the future after a mysterious apocalypse. The survivors chose to go as far away from civilization as possible, just like our main character who lives far from the city with his dog. The main events of the game unfold at night, when the Bolo decides to leave the house, a robber enters the house. And what happened next, you have to find out. Features of the game: Dark, minimalistic style. The main character's reasoning. A touching story. Gameplay: You have to move around the map. Follow what the player says, a bubble with text appears above the player. Solve puzzles. Open and switch levers.
